      public long getTimeForDateString​(String date) throws ParseException
      Parse date string to time in milliseconds
      Parameters:
      date - String in DD_MM_YYYY_POINTS default time format;
      Returns:
      time in milliseconds from unix epoch start
      Throws:
      ParseException - if format is invalid

    • getUnixTimeForDateString

      public long getUnixTimeForDateString​(String date) throws ParseException
      Parse date string to time in seconds (unix time)
      Parameters:
      date - String in DD_MM_YYYY_POINTS default time format;
      Returns:
      time in seconds since 1 Jan 1970
      Throws:
      ParseException - Invalid Input Format
